description.value:
Variant Profession: Specialist

Your chosen profession led you to be highly trained and specialized in a specific area, such as the mastery of a weapon or tool, magic, or some other skill. Or perhaps you have fortified your body or mind. Whatever it is you trained at, your abilities in it are truly remarkable.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one of your ability scores by one.

Feat. You gain a feat of your choice.

Skills. You are proficient in one skill of your choice.

Other. You gain one language or proficiency with one artisan’s tool or weapon.
